byline.contributor: J. David Goodman contributed reporting, and Susan C. Beachy contributed research.
byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and ELI ROSENBERG

abstract: New York City police say they are searching for three men involved in fatal shooting of Michael Matusiak in East Williamsburg, Brooklyn, which occurred after Matusiak and his co-workers confronted men about breaking into cars.
lead_paragraph: The attack occurred after a group of sheet metal workers including Michael Matusiak, who was killed, sought to shoo away three men in the Brooklyn neighborhood, the police said.

headline.main: Worker Is Fatally Shot Trying to Prevent Vehicle Break-Ins in East Williamsburg
headline.print_headline: Worker Trying to Prevent Vehicle Break-Ins Is Fatally Shot; Police Seek 3 Men

snippet: The attack occurred after a group of sheet metal workers including Michael Matusiak, who was killed, sought to shoo away three men in the Brooklyn neighborhood, the police said.
